name: Nautquest
description:
I worked on this project in 2016 and 2017. It is based off a universe created by a someone I used to know. 

It was my first experience with Gamemaker. I chose the engine because at the time it was the only free engine that didn't take a percentage of your profits, and Hyper Light Drifter was made in Gamemaker, which was a huge inspiration for this game.

Real life events happened, and I stopped talking to the person that came up with the concept for this game. I moved on to other projects but I always felt this one was really cool.
